# `@arcane-web/arcane-layouts`

This is a Arcane's astrojs layout package, exported as `@arcane-web/arcane-layouts`. It consists of various layouts that would need some island hydrated javascript interactive components. This package currently contains components like **Header**, **Footer**, **DefaultLayout**.

It also contains arcane css design system styling and color scheme.

### Header

The **Header** component generates a `<header>` which is static with Arcane **Logo** and takes set of **slots** related to sign-in, navigation and themetoggle.

```astro
---
import * as Component from '@arcane-web/arcane-layouts';
import {
  ThemeToggle,
  Navigation,
  Authentication,
} from '@arcane-web/arcane-components';
---
<Component.Header>
    <Navigation slot="navigation" />
    <ThemeToggle client:visible slot="theme" />
    <Authentication client:visible slot="auth" />
</Component.Header>
```
